messages.message: I find it unintuitive that to get back to previous conversations in Converse, I need to go through the *Start Conversation* button on the *Discover* tab (or if there is another way I haven’t found it). I thought I’d be able to get to my saved conversations from the *My Hub* tab, but don’t see a way. Maybe add a *My Conversations* section/tab to *My Hub*, instead of just *My Apps*, or a standalone *My Conversations* tab in the top bar?
Very useful insight! @alagu @Kerry we should definitely consider this in future evolution of My hub experience
